basics.name: Sae Hyun Song
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2018. Eventually, I would like to become a Full Stack Developer or a Software Engineer.

work.company: Department of Civil and Environmental Engineering – University of Hawai`i at Mānoa
work.summary: Developing a dynamic website with an SQL server database for safety data analysis and safety data management.
highlights: Utilizing MySQL with phpMyAdmin, PHP, HTML / CSS, JavaScript, and Leaflet map API.

work.company: Office of Student Life and Development - Student Recreation Services
work.summary: Management of front desk operations at the Warrior Recreation Center.
highlights: Management of the hiring and firing process
Accountable for overseeing front desk operations
Handling administrative tasks and monetary deposits
Scheduling employees based off of their availability and providing training for employees
Problem solving and being able to make executive decisions based off of the circumstances given
Maintaining, updating, and overseeing the student recreation services website and its social media

volunteer.organization: Hawaii Department of Education - Kaimuki High School
volunteer.summary: Helped with painting and maintaing a mural in the hall way as part of the AVID Program

volunteer.organization: Hawaii Department of Education - Kaimuki High School
volunteer.summary: Planting, campus beautifying, and cleaning as part of the Kaimuki Go Green Project

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.awarder: Dean of College of Natural Sciences
awards.summary: Students of the highest grade point averages for the semester receives this honor.

awards.title: Certificate of Recognition for participation in taking the lessons of Hawai`i's World War II Confinement Sites to High Schools
awards.summary: Recognition for spreading awareness of the World War II Internment camps of Japanese people in Hawaii contributing to the Honouliuli Internment Camp becoming a National Monument

awards.title: Soft Tennis MVP Award
awards.summary: Most valuable player for soft tennis
